text:
David Hussey (born 1952/1953) is an American actor, comedian, singer, dancer and musician, who is best known for his role as Ronald McDonald in the McDonald's commercials from 2000 to 2014 and voicing Ronald in "The Wacky Adventures of Ronald McDonald", replacing Jack Doepke.
Personal life.
Hussey is married to Tonilyn Hussey; together they have a son.

annotations.surface_form: The Wacky Adventures of Ronald McDonald
